title: # 301 - Jim Florentine & ME
description:
My Special “Secret Time” is available on Netflix August 24th!

Today I sit down with Jim Florentine to talk about crazy sex stories, how Jim started in comedy, how Jim met Andrew Dice Clay, Jim Norton, Crank Yankers, Bert's Dan Marino story, Jim's Eminem stories, and much more! 

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron. Get your first 3 meals free at www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Leesa Mattresses. Try 100 nights risk free and get $160 off of a Leesa Mattress by going to www.leesa.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Beach Body. For your free trial membership text Bert to 303030

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
